channel.title: How do i convert models
channel.description: how do i convert a model into a int im asking cause mopar is pro and everyone is pro and im a noob i can code do all that but i forgot how to convert someone please awnser and help me.

item.title: How do i convert models
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Describe it to us more, Do you want to add the Int’s to class8, Or whatever the Item
Class is on client’s, You GZIP it, then you get the Right model id’s and add it,

The code example would be like this:

[code]if(i == 2518){ //Item id
	class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
	class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
	class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
	class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
	class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;
	class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;

class8.anInt174 = 7227;
class8.anInt181 = 919;
class8.anInt190 = 429;
class8.anInt204 = 318;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 5;
class8.anInt165 = 230;
class8.anInt188 = 7242;
class8.anInt200 = 403;
class8.anInt164 = 7241;
class8.anInt175 = 63;
class8.anInt166 = 7243;
class8.anInt197 = 120;
class8.anInt173 = 7243;
class8.aString170 = “Void Mage Helm”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A void knight magic helmet.”.getBytes();
} [/code]

I’m not the best with client’s but its something like that, You add your model id though,
And your id’s would be a bit shorter,
You need to add the Ground model, Female + male.

Read full topic
